programme.title: برنامج مواهب في تجويد القرآن الكريم
Nass El Houma
programme.desc: The series tells the story of residents of a rural neighborhood in the city of Casablanca, who used to live a quiet life, until the day when they learn that their neighborhood will be demolished by an investor to build a modern shopping center.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Nass El Houma
programme.desc: The series tells the story of residents of a rural neighborhood in the city of Casablanca, who used to live a quiet life, until the day when they learn that their neighborhood will be demolished by an investor to build a modern shopping center.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.title: Hayet Khassa
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the daily life of Tunisian youth, through the depiction of the everyday lives of college students and the problems they encounter as they graduate and start working, with a focus on the struggles working women face to balance their jobs with their obligations at home.

programme.desc: In the town of Tal Al-Sabr, near the city of Nablus, Palestinian prisoner Bilal survives after escaping from the occupier, as his aunt Umm Askar saves him from a certain death. Bilal changes his name to Assif and the events go on.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn cael bod yn Sheriff Pentref Papur Pop. On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn becomes Pop Paper City's cowboy sheriff.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri a'r criw yn chwilio am micro-blastigau ar draeth Amroth ac ma criw o ddisgyblion Ysgol Penboyr wrthi'n garddio. Huw joins Nanw and Gwenno on their favourite Menai Strait walk.

programme.desc: Hanes Siôn Williams, o'r Foel, sydd nawr yn Rheolwr Fferm ar stad enfawr Buccleuch, yr Alban. We meet Siôn Williams, from Dyffryn Banw, who's now a busy Farm Manager in the Scottish Borders.

programme.title: Sam Tân
programme.desc: Mae Mrs. Chen yn colli rheolaeth ar y bws yn ystod trip ysgol, ond diolch byth mae Sam Tân yn achub y dydd! Mrs Chen loses control of the bus on the school trip but Sam Tân saves the day!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Ymunwch gyda Meleri a Huw wrth iddyn nhw grwydro Cymru a chael pob math o antur yn yr awyr agored. Today: a wet and muddy assault course, skateboarding, and the world's fastest zip line.

programme.title: Siwrne Ni

programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Prys a'r Pryfed heddiw? What's happening in Prys a'r Pryfed's world today?

programme.title: New: Boom!
programme.desc: Yn y bennod yma, bydd y brodyr Bidder yn dangos pa mor bwerus yw pibelli dwr y gwasanaeth tân. Today, the brothers reveal the effects that different drinks have on our teeth.

programme.title: Bois y Pizza: Chwe' Gwlad
